title: Zero Pucks Given
description: They're both driven to succeed--at all costs. But neither of them expects that to include wedding vows...BeauBeing captain of my team has always been a dream of mine since I first stepped out on the ice.When Gigi slams into my life, everything I’ve known is shaken.I’ve never been in a fake relationship before—especially with someone who hates me.But if it means finally reaching my goal, I’ll do just about anything. That is, if I can keep my eyes—and my hands—off her.GigiI’ve dreamed of marrying Beau Moreau—superstar hockey forward—for as long as I can remember.Now I dream about punching him right in the junk.After he ticks me off and breaks my heart—all while ogling my chest—my girlhood crush on this older man is officially over.I think.
author: Jessa York
